humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest tumor as 2.5 x 2.1 x 1.0 cm. According to the rules, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that the invasive ductal carcinoma forms a 2.5 x 2.1 x 1.0 cm mass. In the TNM staging system for breast cancer, T2 indicates a tumor that is 2.0 to 5.0 cm in size. Therefore, the pathologic T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
